actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 97-983.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Yea-Nay Vote: 256 - 32 (Record Vote No: 486).

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3809) to provide for the development of repositories for the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel, to establish a program of research, development, and demonstration regarding the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel, and for other purposes, and the Senate amendment thereto.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 3809 (Radioactive waste disposal).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 3809) to provide for the development of repositories for the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel, to establish a program of research, development, and demonstration regarding the disposal of high-level radioactive waste and spent nuclear fuel, and for other purposes, and the Senate amendment thereto.
